results.firPara: Slaven Bilic has confirmed that West Ham United dismissed offers from the Chinese Super League for Andy Carroll, claiming manager and player didnt talk about it at all.
results.secPara: Reports had linked Carroll, 28, with a move to the far east during their winter window, which closed this week. But Bilic said the club had no interest in selling one of its best players and also denied the club had authorised an agent to broker a move. He went on to say that the striker is in contention for a return to the West Ham side for Mondays Premier League encounter with Chelsea.
results.webTitle: West Ham turned down Chinese offers for Andy Carroll, says Slaven Bilic

results.firPara: The Arsenal midfielder Mesut Özil has claimed in his autobiography that during their time working together at Real Madrid, José Mourinho called him a coward.
results.secPara: The pair both joined Real in the summer of 2010 and left in the summer of 2013, winning La Liga and the Copa del Rey together.
results.webTitle: José Mourinho called me a 'coward' in Real Madrid row, reveals Mesut Özil

results.firPara: The new season kicks off on Friday and doesnt end until December. Its partly down to travel, and partly to geography – but TV complicates matters too
results.secPara: The new season kicks off on Friday and doesnt end until December. Its partly down to travel, and partly to geography – but TV complicates matters too
results.webTitle: Why does the MLS season last so long?

results.firPara: The Sweden womens team have dropped the names on the back of their football shirts in favour of messages that inspire and motivate women to show that everything is possible.
results.secPara: Sweden, who finished second at the 2016 Olympic Games in Rio, released the shirts this week as they prepared to take part in the Algarve Cup.
results.webTitle: Swedish women’s team replace shirt names with messages of empowerment

results.firPara: That was a highly entertaining duel from which both sides emerge with credit. City were deserving winners and produced some sparkling attacking play because Huddersfield forced them to.
results.secPara: Tanking achieved! It came via a fine flowing move, started by Fernandinho - and finished by Iheanacho from an offside position.
results.webTitle: Manchester City v Huddersfield: FA Cup fifth-round replay – as it happened

results.firPara: Leo Messi, Luis Suarez and Neymar were all on the scoresheet as Barcelona returned to the top of La Liga with a crushing win
results.secPara: A comfortable win for Barcelona, Leo Messi, Luis Suarez and Neymar all on the scoresheet. They go top, but for how long? Real Madrid are in action now against Las Palmas. Thanks for reading. Bye.
